Basic information.MasCN全称为Masons，一种免费使用和自由传播的操作系统内核，使用GNU: MasCN stands for Masons, a free-to-use and freely distributed operating system kernel that is open source using the GNU GPLv2.0 license.
Basic information.MasCN是一个嵌入式的操作系统内核，使用C语言和汇编语言开发而成。它有一个主分: MasCN is an embedded operating system kernel developed using C & assembly language. It has a main branch that runs under x86-64 CPUs and a secondary branch that runs under ARMCPU, with consistent functionality between the two architectures.
Basic information.功能会持续的开发和完善，具体的更新在Version页面展示: The function will continue to be developed and improved, and the specific updates will be displayed on the Version page

Development ingestion.系统的引导部分是基于UEFI及其接口进行开发的。如MasCNBootPkg部分的: The boot part of the system is developed based on UEFI and its interfaces. For example, all the code in the MasCNBootPkg section is based on UEFI.
Development ingestion.具体的UEFI开发使用说明可以查看Docs页面的内容或是前往UEFI的官网查询。: For specific UEFI development instructions, you can check the content of the Docs page or go to the official website of UEFI.
Development ingestion.在实际的代码中开发中，使用到UEFI的源代码是edk2项目中的，引导程序的编译也: In the actual code development, the source code used in UEFI is in the edk2 project, and the bootstrapper is compiled under the compilation tools provided under edk2.
Development ingestion.启动系统时，在启动动画后面的操作就开始跳出UEFI，进入内核。: When you start the system, the action after the boot animation starts to jump out of UEFI and into the kernel.
